thread.title: Paris Jackson wishes Blanket a happy 15th birthday | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Paris Jackson wishes Blanket a happy 15th birthday | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Paris Jackson wishes Blanket a happy 15th birthday | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Blanket - full name Prince Michael Jackson II - was born in a greater Los Angeles area hospital on February 21, 2002. The identity of his mother - believed to have been a surrogate - is unknown. Paris and her older brother 'Prince' Michael Joseph Jackson Jr., 20, are the late King of Pop's kids with his ex-wife Debbie Rowe. Blanket - full name Prince Michael Jackson II - is the youngest of the late Michael Jackson's three children. The identity of his mother is unknown. He's pictured in LA on February 3 Nostalgic: Paris, pictured at the Grammys in LA on February 12, seemed to lament the fact that she and her siblings are growing up as she reminisced about their childhood Paris's post comes one week after she did the same thing to mark Prince's 20th birthday, sharing an old photograph of them together. The snap shows Paris and Prince as very young children with Paris holding her head in her hands and a very blonde Prince winking at the camera. 'The coolest big brother ever and my bestest friend in the whole wide world is 20 today and i honestly can't believe how fast the time has gone by,' the teen wrote. 'Thank you gooko for always supporting me and encouraging me to be myself. there's no one like you, you're my rock. happy birthday, i love you.' 'Coolest big brother ever': Last week, on February 13, she shared another throwback photo, this time of herself and her older brother Prince, to celebrate his 20th birthday Sheltered childhood: The three children, seen honoring their dad in January 2012 in Hollywood, were kept out of the public eye by the late King of Pop before his June 2009 death Famous father: Jackson, pictured in 2003 at the age of 45, had his two older Children Paris and Prince with ex-wife Debbie Rowe. It's believed he had son Blanket via a surrogate
